titleStmt.title: The returne of the knight of the poste from Hell with the diuels aunswere to the supplication of Pierce Penilesse, with some relation of the last treasons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn VVindet for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: "Pierce Penilesse his supplication to the diuel" is by Thomas Nash.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
Imperfect: the title page is a facsimile.
